Posts.Content: May 21, 2010 03:14PM Andraw wrote: Thanks for your reply. I check the website in Chinese for GSK, there is no Lapatinib, because this medicine is not imported to China right now.
Posts.Title: How to apply Lapatinib clinical trial Andraw mimi1030

Posts.Content: Andraw wrote: Hi, dear all, My sister is in China. My sister has breast cancer at stage IV, now her cancer cell already mets her bone, lung and liver. Her doctor recommend her to take Lapatinib for treatment as soon as possible, but this medicine is very expensive and we cannot afford it. Can I apply for clinical trial for her from USA? How? I am in Houston. Thanks! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How to apply Lapatinib clinical trial Andraw mimi1030
